org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.impl

Class DcsBoPackageOntologyServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.impl.DcsBoPackageOntologyServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PackageOntologyService

    public class DcsBoPackageOntologyServiceImpl
extends Object
implements PackageOntologyService

    This implementation of PackageOntologyService is suitable for ontologies in which hierarchical relationships are essential in determining the graph of related Artifacts.

      • changeType

        public void changeType(PackageDescription packageDesc,
                       PackageTree tree,
                       String artifactId,
                       String newTypeName)
                throws PackageOntologyException

        In this implementation, changing from DataFile to MetadataFile and vice versa affects the relationship of the current artifact to its parent (isMetadataFor vs isMemberOf). Additionally, changing a DataItem to a Collection, when valid, affects the children of the DataItems and their relationship to the DataItem (DataFiles become. MetadataFiles)

        These mappings are being done by this method in addition to change the type property on the current artifact.

        This implementation also allows the transformation of a collection's MetadataFile into a combination of DataItem and DataTime and vice versa.
        Specified by:
        changeType in interface PackageOntologyService
        Parameters:
        packageDesc - the PackageDescription
        tree - The tree representing the PackageDescription the artifact is a member of
        artifactId - id of the the artifact whose type is to be change
        newTypeName - The type the artifact should be changed to.
        Throws:
        PackageOntologyException - if the new type is not valid

      • getPropertyMaxOccurrences

        public int getPropertyMaxOccurrences(PackageArtifact artifact,
                                     String propertyName,
                                     String typeName)
        Description copied from interface: PackageOntologyService
        Gets the max number of times a property can occur.
        Specified by:
        getPropertyMaxOccurrences in interface PackageOntologyService
        Parameters:
        artifact - The artifact which the property is attached to.
        propertyName - The name of the property
        typeName - The containing property type if the property is a sub property contained in a group, can be empty or null.
        Returns:
        The maximum number of times a property can occur, or -1 if the property can't be found.

        Description copied from interface: PackageOntologyService

      • getUnFormattedProperty

        public String getUnFormattedProperty(PackageArtifact artifact,
                                     String parentPropertyName,
                                     String propertyName,
                                     String propertyValue)
        Description copied from interface: PackageOntologyService
        For properties that are stored in a formatted state, this function returns a copy of the value without formatting.
        Specified by:
        getUnFormattedProperty in interface PackageOntologyService
        Parameters:
        artifact - The artifact that contains the property.
        parentPropertyName - The name of the containing property if the property is part of a complex type. Can be empty or null if the property is not a part of a complex property.
        propertyName - The name of the property to transform.
        propertyValue - The current formatted value of the property.
        Returns:
        The value of the property with any special formatting removed. May be the original value if no special formatting is defined.

      • getFormattedProperty

        public String getFormattedProperty(PackageArtifact artifact,
                                   String parentPropertyName,
                                   String propertyName,
                                   String propertyValue)
        Description copied from interface: PackageOntologyService
        Formats a property value based on formatting specified by the ontology.
        Specified by:
        getFormattedProperty in interface PackageOntologyService
        Parameters:
        artifact - The artifact that contains the property.
        parentPropertyName - The name of the containing property if the property is part of a complex type. Can be empty or null if the property is not a part of a complex property.
        propertyName - The name of the property to format.
        propertyValue - The current unformatted value of the property.
        Returns:
        The value of the property formatted with whatever formatting is specified by the ontology. May be the original value if no special formatting is defined.

      • validateProperty

        public PropertyValidationResult validateProperty(PackageArtifact artifact,
                                                 String parentPropertyName,
                                                 String propertyName,
                                                 String propertyValue)
        Description copied from interface: PackageOntologyService
        Checks whether a property value is valid based on the property type specified by the ontology.
        Specified by:
        validateProperty in interface PackageOntologyService
        Parameters:
        artifact - The artifact that contains the property.
        parentPropertyName - The name of the containing property if the property is part of a complex type. Can be empty or null if the property is not a part of a complex property.
        propertyName - The name of the property to check for validity.
        propertyValue - The value of the property to check for validity.
        Returns:
        A PropertyValidationResult that contains whether or not the property is valid and key on what hint to use to notify the user.
